TextReturnerServletItems.item: 0 - It's always darkest before the dawn
1 - A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
2 - The universe is like stupidity: both are infinite... and actually, I'm not sure about the universe
3 - I believe there is intelligent life in the universe, except for some parts of New Jersey
4 - If your falling of a cliff, you might as well try and fly
5 - The cost of life is to chance the consequence
